'''''Mallorn'' 45''' is the forty-fifth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s biannual journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]'', published in Spring [[2008]]. Mallorn 45 was the first issue to be published since [[Mallorn 44]] in [[August]] [[2006]] due to the change of editor and overhaul of the publication; it was the first Mallorn to be published biannually.
